directions: Using electric mixer, beat cream cheese and butter in large bowl until fluffy. Add brown sugar; beat until well blended. Add powdered sugar 1/2 cup (scant) at a time, beating well after each addition. Beat in orange juice concentrate and vanilla. Chill until firm enough to spread, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 3/4 cup (1 1/2 sticks) unsalted butter, room temperature
1 1/2 tablespoons frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
title: Creamy Brown Sugar Frosting
